name: GRT
description:
We believe that digital technology products should enhance all aspects of everyday life. Our goal is to build products that matters. The ones that seamlessly integrate and benefit user, regardless of product size or domain.
To achieve this, we built a team that is even more effective than if you hired in-house developers. GRT processes are tailored for delivering solutions to business needs in a user-friendly way. we are going to work together to clarify your vision and align process accordingly, without overwhelming you with technical stuff. Our expertise enables us to choose best-suiting technologies and tools.
Besides that:
- We scale with business needs. We can help you whether you need a simple MVP, long term support or complex service.
- You pay for what you see. We are confident in quality of our work and not asking for payments before you get value.
- You are involved. We encourage our customers to be as close to their team as possible. Each client has opportunity to chat or talk with his team, and is welcome to visit us in person in our office. It is possible to send our guys to client's office for a period of time if needed.
- We take work we can accomplish. We accept projects only if needed capacity is avaliable at the moment. Otherwise, we move on to other opportunities.
- We stick to agreed time and budget. However, we are flexible to changes for the sake of the end product.
All of these helps us to build products that directly serve their purpose and integrate into real life
